txt.en: Listen to the conversation
'Well, well. You have chosen wisely to join my side.'
Someone, or something, has created a diversion for you!\n\nYou should escape the Halls of Black Lore!
Instance: Nothing for Nothing
Escape the Halls
'Cease your threats, Lady of Blight. I owe no allegiance to the False King.'
'They are heading this way!'
'But what if it was him? We can't leave him!'
'We need to move!'
'Intruders!'
'Nothing for nothing, Lady of Blight. A fair exchange is required.'
'Archivist! I have scoured this city and slain many of Gothmog's soldiers for the information I seek. I know you must have it here. Come forth, or suffer my wrath.'
'Is that her? Lhaereth the Stained?'
'Viznak!'
Lhaereth bursts into the Halls!
Talk to Faeron
Lhaereth moves to strike the archivist again, then stops. Her expression relaxes
With a snap of his fingers, Dolguzigir summons a large tome
Lhaereth flips through the pages, quickly reading the tome
Follow Faeron
<rgb=#FF0000>You were seen by Dolguzigir!</rgb>
'Insolent fool. Give me what I seek or I will burn your precious archive to the ground! WHERE IS THE TREE?'
'That sounded like-'
'Hide!'
'As you wish. I will gift this archive with the recipe for my Great Plague.'
TBD
'Curses!'
'If you are satisfied, you may follow me to uphold your end of our bargain. This way, if you please.'
You have entered the Halls of Black Lore.\n\nYou should speak to Faeron.
You have entered the Halls of Black Lore to uncover what Lhaereth seeks, but danger is near.
I do not think we were seen. We should return to the tower.
You hear a sudden crash and a yelp!
'Stay together, stay quiet. Remember: if Lhaereth is already here, do not engage.'
You have safely made it outside
'We cannot fight her! Go!'
<rgb=#FF0000>You were seen by Lhaereth!</rgb>
You should follow Faeron and keep to the shadows.
Lhaereth has entered and is speaking to one who can only be the keeper of the Halls of Black Lore.\n\nYou should listen to their conversation.
<rgb=#FF0000>You were seen by Lhaereth!</rgb>
'My, the Witch-king was quite productive in his time. Hm, the Houses of Lamentation...'
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not be seen!</rgb>
'Who?'
'Stay together, stay quiet. Remember: if Lhaereth is already here, do not engage.'
'You are mistaken. My allegiance is only to knowledge. To the Halls of Black Lore. It is mine to safe-guard. Nothing is added or removed without my permission.'
'I do not think we were seen. We should return to the tower.'
